lead_paragraph: Authorities in China have organized civilian militias to help secure largely unprotected areas that are near the border of North Korea, a state-run publication has reported.
snippet: Authorities in China have organized civilian militias to help secure largely unprotected areas that are near the border of North Korea, a state-run publication has reported.

headline.main: Beijing Moves to Halt Crime Spilling Out of North Korea
headline.print_headline: Beijing Moves to Halt Crime Spilling In From North Korea
